headline: Robinhood Stock Tumbles 20%
summary: It’s been a bad day for financial-sector stocks.  Robinhood Markets was among those leading the downslide.  The brokerage’s shares tumbled nearly 20% Monday, as recession fears and other market jitters dragged on bank and brokerage stocks.

headline: Retail traders are getting spooked by a market downturn. That’s bad news for brokerage stocks.
